lexUnit.name: deliberate.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: a jury engaging in careful consideration to reach a verdict

sentence.text: The jury of two blacks , nine whites and an Asian deliberated for 2 hours , 40 minutes before returning a verdict .

NEW YORK ( AP ) --- The jury had deliberated only seven hours in the case against 10 militant Muslims accused of plotting to bomb U.S. landmarks , but already defense lawyer Anthony Ricco was discouraged .
The jury deliberated the case for more than three days before reaching its decision Tuesday .
In this trial , a jury of seven men and five women heard five weeks of testimony and deliberated nine hours before reaching a unanimous verdict of guilty .
He plans to send jurors out to deliberate their verdicts on Monday .
Some evidence has been `` disgusting and perverted , '' but LeSage cautioned jurors to use logic instead of sentiment when deliberating their verdict .
Therein lies the crucial question for jurors who begin Monday to deliberate 10 charges of murder against Rosemary West .
In New York City , a jury is deliberating the fate of Sheik Omar Abdel-Rahman and nine other Muslims accused of plotting to bomb city landmarks .
MINEOLA , N.Y. ( AP ) --- After watching weeks of bizarre courtroom encounters , jurors have begun deliberating the fate of the Jamaican accused of the Long Island Rail Road massacre .

NEW YORK --- The jury deliberating the fate of Don King in the boxing promoter 's insurance fraud trial askes Tuesday to rehear testimony from a former employee , a current employee and boxer Julio Cesar Chavez .
The jury adjourned Monday night after deliberating six hours , and resumed deliberations Tuesday .
The jury of three men and nine women deliberated nearly three hours Saturday before returning verdicts .

The latest jury deliberated nearly three hours Saturday before finding Crumitie guilty of first-degree murder , second-degree attempted murder , attempted armed robbery , robbery and shooting into an occupied vehicle .

The Greenbrier County Circuit Court jury deliberated nine hours over two days in the trial of Tracy Lippard , 23 , of Newport News , Va .

NEW YORK ( AP ) --- The federal jury deliberating insurance fraud charges against boxing promoter Don King said Thursday it was deadlocked and unable to reach a verdict .
Circuit Judge S.E. Steinmeyer declared a mistrial Thursday after the jury had deliberated about six hours .
A panel of judges had been deliberating since then .
